Methods

createURI

(
  • name
  • domain
  • path
)

Defined in src/CORE/Utils/createURI.js:1

Generates URI for objects.

Parameters:

  • name String

    Name of the item which the URI will be created.

  • domain String

    Under what domain the URI will be created

  • path String

    The type of item.

Example:

console.log(createURI("People", "http://abc.com", "ontology")); //will output - http://abc.com/ontology/People

Parameters:

  • n Integer

    The lenght of the random string to be created

Defined in src/CORE/Utils/stripDomain.js:1
